topic.title: 5.1.2 Machine Controller Has Received M06 Command But Operation Does Not Start

header.para: Machine Controller Has Received M06 Command But Operation Does Not Start

body.para: When the machine controller receives the M06 command, the [CYCLE START] switch is illuminated. If an alarm is triggered during the operation, M06 is not executed. Eliminate the cause of alarm.
Check for specific alarm generated during tool change. Refer to alarm detail in Alarm Detail screen or refer to 18 Alarm List.
